title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Education Design for Low-Income High School Teachers in Nepal

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening digital content creation and internet utilization skills in smartphone-only environments, with a formative assessment-centered iterative feedback structure and practical approaches considering Nepal's local educational context

learning_goals: Create at least three types of math concept visualization content (graphs, geometric figures, etc.) using mobile devices
Develop at least five context-specific math problems using free online resources (GeoGebra, YouTube educational channels, etc.)
Design and operate formative assessment items (10+ questions) using smartphone-based quiz apps (e.g., Kahoot!)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
